hero_title: The Digital Marketplace for Fresh Produce
hero_subtitle: Connecting producers directly with businesses. Bid on fresh, quality agricultural goods in real-time auctions.
hero_title_2: From Our Fields to Your Table
hero_subtitle_2: Discover the richness of Indonesia's top agricultural commodities.
hero_subtitle_3: Access premium seafood through our transparent auction platform.
featured_auctions_subtitle: Get in on the action with these trending auctions.
how_it_works_subtitle: A simple, transparent, and efficient process.
find_products_desc: Browse our diverse marketplace or search for specific goods you need.
place_bids_desc: Enter our real-time auction rooms and place competitive bids on items.
win_ship_desc: Secure your products and arrange seamless logistics with our trusted partners.
trusted_partners_subtitle: A network of industry leaders supporting our marketplace.
bid_history_desc: A record of your recent bidding activity.
footer_tagline: The future of agricultural trade, today.
featured_processed_products_subtitle: Discover leading processed food products from Indonesia.
export_feature_desc: Partner with our verified exporters to bring your products to the international stage. We help you meet quality standards and simplify logistics.
export_partner_program_subtitle: Exporters are verified producers who have successfully completed 5 auction transactions and meet legal export requirements.
why_join_subtitle: Unlock your business's full potential by reaching international buyers.
benefit_1_desc: Expand your reach beyond local markets and tap into a global network of buyers.
benefit_2_desc: Our admin validation ensures your products meet international export quality standards.
benefit_3_desc: Work with our trusted logistics partners for seamless and efficient shipping.
how_it_works_subtitle_exporter: A clear path for Producers to start exporting.
exporter_step_1_desc: The first step is to register and get verified as a Producer on our platform.
exporter_step_2_desc: Build your track record by successfully completing at least five auction transactions.
exporter_step_3_desc: After fulfilling the transaction requirements, upload your legal documents for verification. These must include a legal entity deed (PT, CV, etc.), an NPWP (Tax ID), and one valid business license (e.g., SIUP).
exporter_step_4_desc: Congratulations! Your status will be upgraded, and you can now access export facilities and mentor other producers.
start_your_journey_now: Your journey to becoming an exporter begins by registering as a producer.
join_program_desc: Fill out the form below to start your journey to the global market.
products_to_export_placeholder: e.g. Arabica Coffee Beans, Frozen Shrimp
sell_your_product_desc: Fill in the details below to create a new auction listing.
admin_verification_note: Your product will be reviewed by an admin before being listed for auction.
fill_all_fields_for_suggestion: Please fill all fields (name, description, category, and image) to get a price suggestion.
price_suggestion_success_desc: The AI has successfully suggested a starting price.
price_suggestion_error_desc: Failed to get price suggestion from AI. Please try again.
product_submitted_desc: Your product has been successfully submitted for admin verification.
dashboard_subtitle: Manage your activities and view your performance on AgriBid.
my_products_desc: View and manage your product listings for auction.
bidder_dashboard_desc: Track your bids and auction activity.
partner_dashboard_desc: Manage producer verifications and mentoring schedules.
mentoring_schedule_desc: View and manage upcoming mentoring sessions.
exporter_dashboard_desc: Access export-ready commodities and manage your shipments.
membership_card_subtitle: This card is proof of your verified membership on AgriBid.
regulation_1: This card is personal and non-transferable.
regulation_2: Members must comply with the terms and conditions of AgriBid Indonesia.
regulation_3: The card must be presented upon request for verification.
regulation_4: Misuse of the card will result in membership revocation.
membership_benefits_title: Benefits of Being an AgriBid Member
membership_benefits_subtitle: Unlock exclusive features and gain a competitive edge in the marketplace.
benefit_exclusive_auctions_desc: Get access to member-only auctions with premium commodities.
benefit_verified_network_desc: Transact with confidence within a trusted and verified community.
benefit_priority_support_desc: Receive faster assistance from our dedicated support team.
benefit_membership_card_desc: Get a digital card as proof of your verified status in the AgriBid ecosystem.
admin_dashboard_desc: Oversee and manage the entire platform.
pending_product_verifications_desc: Review and approve or reject new product submissions.
user_management_desc: View, manage, and monitor all users on the platform.
edit_product_desc: Update the details for your product listing.
product_updated_desc: Your product has been successfully updated.
bid_must_be_higher: Your bid must be at least {{amount}}.
bid_placed_desc: Your bid of {{amount}} has been recorded.
payment_info_desc: All transactions are processed through the joint account: BCA 5735434656 a/n Azwar Riyadh Subarkah (admin). An administration fee of 10% will be applied to the final transaction amount.
upload_documents_and_check_eligibility: Upload your legal documents and use our AI assistant to check your eligibility.
submit_for_admin_verification_desc: Once eligible, you can submit your application for final review by the admin.
ai_check_error_desc: Failed to check eligibility with AI. Please try again.
mentored_producers_desc: Educate and manage up to 10 producers under your guidance.
my_shipments_desc: Track and manage your ongoing and completed export shipments.
